meaningMnemonic: Your <radical>servant</radical> uses a <radical>stool</radical> to break open <radical>shellfish</radical>. You know how much work shucking shellfish is so this method is really <kanji>clever</kanji>.
readingMnemonic: "More <kanji>clever</kanji> than you!" your servant yells, tearing off his wig. "It is I, <reading>Ken</reading> (けん) the samurai. I saw you take this shellfish from my master's lands."
